faq.title: Everything You Need to Kಇಲ್ಲw
faq.subtitle: Get answers to the most common questions about starting your ಎಟಿಎಂ ಫ್ರಾಂಚೈಸಿ business.

investment.question: What is the minimum investment required for an ಎಟಿಎಂ ಫ್ರಾಂಚೈಸಿ?
investment.answer: The ಹೂಡಿಕೆ typically ranges from ₹3-8 lakhs depending on the WLA partner and location. This includes machine cost, installation, and initial working capital. We provide detailed cost breakdowns for each partner.

income.question: How much monthly income can I expect?
income.answer: Our partners typically earn ₹35,000-60,000 monthly. Income depends on location, footfall, and transaction volume. Rural areas often see ₹25-40K while urban locations can generate ₹50-80K monthly.

roi.question: How long does it take to get ROI?
roi.answer: Most partners achieve ROI within 12-18 months. High-traffic locations can see returns in 8-12 months, while smaller towns typically take 15-20 months. We provide location analysis to optimize returns.

costs.question: What are the ongoing operational costs?
costs.answer: Monthly costs include electriನಗರ (₹3-5K), cash loading (2-3% of transactions), maintenance (₹2-3K), and internet (₹1-2K). Total operational costs are typically 15-20% of gross revenue.

technical.question: Do I need technical knowledge to operate an ಎಟಿಎಂ?
technical.answer: ಇಲ್ಲ technical expertise required. WLA partners provide complete training, 24/7 technical support, and remote monitoring. You mainly handle cash loading and basic maintenance coordination.

cash.question: How is cash management handled?
cash.answer: You'll load cash based on usage patterns (typically every 2-4 days). WLA partners provide cash forecasting tools and some offer cash logistics services. Insurance covers cash-in-transit risks.

location.question: What locations work best for ಎಟಿಎಂ placement?
location.answer: High-footfall areas like markets, bus stands, hospitals, colleges, and commercial complexes work best. We conduct detailed location surveys and provide site approval guidance from our experience.

hidden.question: Are there any hidden costs or fees?
hidden.answer: We ensure complete transparency. All costs are disಮುಚ್ಚಿd upfront including machine cost, installation, annual maintenance, and revenue sharing. No hidden charges - what you see is what you pay.

support.question: What support do you provide after ಫ್ರಾಂಚೈಸಿ setup?
support.answer: We offer ongoing business consultation, performance optimization tips, troubleshooting support, and assistance with WLA partner coordination. Our relationship ಮುಂದುವರಿಸಿs beyond just setup.

multiple.question: Can I operate multiple ಎಟಿಎಂ ಫ್ರಾಂಚೈಸಿs?
multiple.answer: Yes, many successful partners operate 2-5 ಎಟಿಎಂs. After your first ಎಟಿಎಂ stabilizes (6-12 months), we can help identify additional locations and streamline multi-location operations.

transparent.title: 100% Transparent
transparent.description: ಇಲ್ಲ hidden costs or surprise fees. Complete transparency in all dealings.

proven.title: Proven Results
proven.description: 95% partner ಯಶಸ್ಸು rate with average ROI in 12-18 months.

quick.title: Quick Setup
quick.description: Fast-track approval and installation within 30-45 days.
